alert.note: Alert for New Madrid; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 10:50AM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...Missouri... Mississippi River Above Tiptonville For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River Above Tiptonville. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 39.0 feet, In Tennessee, water begins to go over Tiptonville Ferry Road, Barr Road, and the farm land east of the Tiptonville Ferry Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 37.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Sunday was 37.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 37.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
